readability_reflection: The string concatenation was easier to read because the interpolation added extra characters that began to get confusing.
comprehension_debugging: It caused me to overthink and spend too much time on certain aspects. Using the interpolation was more difficult to process through each task versus the concatenation.
preference_rationale: I would choose concatenation because its simple compared to using interpolation.
learning_curve: I'm much more unfamiliar with interpolation in programming compared to using concatenation.
suggestions_improvement: Since I've only participated in a few programming courses, I find I don't have any ideas on how to improve it since I'm still becoming familiar with VS Code and using c++ compilers.
